projects.title: react-quick-templates
projects.description: Save some typing by auto-generating simple, ready to go, linted and tested React component skeletons. All you have to do is specify the path to the component, and all sub-directories and the component skeleton will be automatically generated for you!
highlights: Developed a command line tool using node.js
Wrote a testing suite with unit tests and end-to-end tests
Learned about a variety of automated testing and deployment tools and used them to create an automated end-to-end development pipeline

projects.title: Open Now
projects.description: An Android app which curates and recommends restaurants determined by the userâ€™s preferences. Whenever the user opens the app they will immediately see a list of restaurants, making it easy to find the best place to eat. Developed using Java for HackAZ 2016.
highlights: Wrote a client to combine data from Google and Yelp APIs to create robust restraunt bios
Developed algorithms to rank restaurants based on a user profile consisting of catgories weighted by their importance to the user (distance, price, type of food, quality)
Worked on a team to design a highly intuitive user interface which minimized the number of taps to reach any given piece of information
